behavioral_questions.question: Why do you want to attend this college?
Tell me about a time when you faced a challenge in school and how you overcame it.
Describe a situation where you took initiative on a school project or extracurricular activity.
What has been your favorite subject in school, and why?
Can you give an example of a time when you had to balance multiple responsibilities?
Tell me about a time when you worked with others on a group project. How did you contribute?
Describe a situation when you had to step out of your comfort zone to achieve something.
Tell me about a time when you had to overcome a fear or hesitation. What was the outcome?
What extracurricular activity has had the most impact on you, and why?
Give an example of a time when you helped someone or contributed to your community.
Tell me about a time when you set a goal for yourself and how you achieved it.
Describe a moment when you felt proud of your academic or personal achievement.
Can you share an experience where you had to manage a difficult situation with a peer or teacher?
Tell me about a time when you had to work under pressure to meet a deadline. How did you handle it?
Describe a situation where you demonstrated leadership in your school or community.
What is a personal weakness youâ€™ve worked on improving?
Tell me about a time when you learned from a failure or setback.
What role have your hobbies or passions played in shaping your academic interests?
Can you give an example of a time when you had to adapt to a new environment or change?
Describe a time when you made a difficult decision. What did you learn from it?
